problems.statement: Differentiate y = (3x^2 + 1)^4 and simplify the outer-inner structure only.
solution_outline: Identify outer function and inner function.
Differentiate outer with respect to inner.
hint_ladder: Compute derivative of the inside polynomial.

common_mistakes.label: Dropped inner derivative
common_mistakes.reason: Student differentiates only the outer power.
common_mistakes.fix: Explicitly multiply by derivative of inside function.

rubric_hooks.description: Correctly identifies outer and inner functions.

adaptation_notes: Started with low-to-medium complexity due to beginner + slow pace.
Used example-first structure with explicit procedural checkpoints.

citations.title: Calculus Week 3 Notes
citations.snippet: Chain rule: derivative of outer evaluated at inner times derivative of inner.
